speaker: Locker Room
lines: Benches scarred by buckles and victories.
Hooks hold coats that remember better summers.
A bucket with cold water tolerates courage and spit equally.
Handwraps hang to dry and drip old stories.
Someone carved 'Breathe' into the door; someone else added 'Now'.
A friend you haven't met wishes you luck and means it.
The bell sounds closer in here.
Your hands harden. Your heart doesn't need to.

choices.text: Borrow a charm left on a hook.

give_item.name: Luck Tie
give_item.description: A knot that holds when you do

choices.text: Sit a minute and learn the room's breath (mana).
